hiveArticle.title: Bitcoin, Blockchain & Ethereum Meetup in Bangalore, India
hiveArticle.body:
Unocoin, India’s leading Bitcoin & Blockchain company is back with “Bitcoin, Blockchain & Ethereum Meetup” on the disruption happening in the FinTech industry pioneered with Bitcoin (aka “The Internet of Money”) trying to redefine the concept of ‘Money’.

This meetup is designed to address the growing interest in Blockchain (the underlying technology empowering Bitcoin) and the available open platforms to build upon Ethereum (aka “The World Computer”) along with their implications on the business processes.

Unocoin has one mission - “Bringing Bitcoin to Billions”.

Agenda:

1. Introduction to Bitcoin & cryptocurrencies
2. Understanding Blockchain, the technology
3. Segregated Witness & Payment Channels
4. Discussing Ethereum & Smart Contracts
5. Token technology & ICOs (Initial Coin Offerings)

Registration Link : https://goo.gl/TvxVzz 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWiR767QVFZwPntqKQW6Uq7pNNsrmK9SitVfL6HuR2i5P/image.png)
